Abandoned Ruins.name: Abandoned Ruins
Abandoned Ruins.description: Crumbling structures overrun by nature, potentially holding ancient artifacts or hidden dangers.

Ancient Tree.name: Ancient Tree
Ancient Tree.description: A colossal tree of immense age, often considered a sacred or mystical landmark.

Bat Cave.name: Bat Cave
Bat Cave.description: A dark and mysterious cave where a colony of bats reside, rumored to guard ancient secrets.

Beast Tamer's Camp.name: Beast Tamer's Camp
Beast Tamer's Camp.description: A campsite where skilled trainers tame and nurture forest-dwelling beasts.

Bioluminescent Glade.name: Bioluminescent Glade
Bioluminescent Glade.description: A beautiful area where luminescent plants or monsters light up the surroundings at night.

Boggy Marshlands.name: Boggy Marshlands
Boggy Marshlands.description: Vast stretches of murky, unstable land that could hide secrets or rare flora and fauna.

Bubbling Pools.name: Bubbling Pools
Bubbling Pools.description: Natural hot springs or pools with unique properties, perhaps healing or poisonous.

Crow Sanctuary.name: Crow Sanctuary
Crow Sanctuary.description: A peaceful haven for crows, where these intelligent birds gather, possibly led by a wise and enigmatic crow.

Druid Circle.name: Druid Circle
Druid Circle.description: A sacred space where druids perform rituals and commune with nature spirits.

Enchanted Pond.name: Enchanted Pond
Enchanted Pond.description: A mystical pond rumored to have healing or transformative properties.

Fairy Glen.name: Fairy Glen
Fairy Glen.description: A serene, flower-filled glade believed to be a meeting place for whimsical woodland monsters.

Fairy Ring.name: Fairy Ring
Fairy Ring.description: A mysterious circular formation of mushrooms or plants, believed to be a gateway to another realm or hold mystical properties.

Giant's Stump.name: Giant's Stump
Giant's Stump.description: The remnant of a massive fallen tree, now a gathering spot or shelter for forest monsters.

Goldilocks' House.name: Goldilocks' House
Goldilocks' House.description: A cozy cottage inhabited by the curious and adventurous Goldilocks, filled with remnants of her past escapades.

Herb Garden.name: Herb Garden
Herb Garden.description: A cultivated area housing rare and potent herbs, tended by healers or witches.

Herbalist's Garden.name: Herbalist's Garden
Herbalist's Garden.description: A carefully tended area with unique and potent herbs for alchemical purposes.

Misty Clearing.name: Misty Clearing
Misty Clearing.description: A fog-covered area that might be the site of eerie occurrences or mystic rituals.

Monster's Lair.name: Monster's Lair
Monster's Lair.description: A cavern or lair inhabited by a legendary or terrifying swamp creature.

Moon Altar.name: Moon Altar
Moon Altar.description: An enchanted altar that harnesses the power of the moon, often visited by mystics for blessings or rituals.

Mystic Caverns.name: Mystic Caverns
Mystic Caverns.description: Underground passages rumored to hold ancient relics or be home to secretive forest-dwelling monsters.

Mystic Snake Coven.name: Mystic Snake Coven
Mystic Snake Coven.description: A gathering of mystical serpents known for their ancient wisdom and magical prowess, performing secretive rituals.

Overgrown Cemetery.name: Overgrown Cemetery
Overgrown Cemetery.description: A graveyard consumed by the swamp, possibly haunted or hiding lost artifacts.

Ranger's Lookout.name: Ranger's Lookout
Ranger's Lookout.description: A high vantage point used by rangers to surveil the forest and protect its inhabitants.

Rat Laboratory.name: Rat Laboratory
Rat Laboratory.description: A laboratory run by intelligent rats conducting experiments and inventing peculiar contraptions.

Sunlit Grove.name: Sunlit Grove
Sunlit Grove.description: A radiant grove basking in sunlight, exuding tranquility and often used for ceremonies.

Swamp Shaman's Circle.name: Swamp Shaman's Circle
Swamp Shaman's Circle.description: A sacred site used for spiritual gatherings or rituals by the local tribes or shamans.

Waterfall Oasis.name: Waterfall Oasis
Waterfall Oasis.description: A hidden, picturesque waterfall surrounded by lush foliage, serving as a tranquil resting place.

Wildlife Sanctuary.name: Wildlife Sanctuary
Wildlife Sanctuary.description: A protected area thriving with diverse monsters, guarded by nature-loving druids or rangers.

Wisp-lit Trail.name: Wisp-lit Trail
Wisp-lit Trail.description: A trail illuminated by mystical wisps, said to guide travelers but also lead them astray.

Witch's Hut.name: Witch's Hut
Witch's Hut.description: A secluded dwelling inhabited by a mystical figure rumored to possess powerful knowledge or magical items.

Shaman's Retreat.name: Shaman's Retreat
Shaman's Retreat.description: A secluded sanctuary where shamans commune with spirits and perform sacred rituals.

Druid Altar.name: Druid Altar
Druid Altar.description: An ancient stone altar used by druids to honor nature and channel its energy.

Alchemist Laboratory.name: Alchemist Laboratory
Alchemist Laboratory.description: A well-equipped laboratory where alchemists conduct experiments and create potions.

Ranger's Cabin.name: Ranger's Cabin
Ranger's Cabin.description: A cozy cabin serving as a base for forest rangers to rest and protect the wilderness.

Hermit's Garden.name: Hermit's Garden
Hermit's Garden.description: A carefully tended garden filled with diverse herbs and plants for medicinal purposes.

Ornithologist's Watchtower.name: Ornithologist's Watchtower
Ornithologist's Watchtower.description: A tall tower used by ornithologists to observe and study various bird species in the forest.
